Statement 1: An application for compulsory license under Section
                                  84 can be made at any time after the grant of the patent.


 
  Statement 2:


An application for compulsory license under Section 84 can be made by any
                                  interested person.

Statement 1: The patent application shall be ordinarily open to
                                the public after a period of 18 months from the date of filing the application
                                
 
  Statement 2: The applicant shall be
                                entitled to file a suit for infringement after the publication of the patent application
